definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
Intoxicating Spring Nights, 1924 short story by Yu Dafu 郁達夫|郁达夫[Yu4 Da2 fu1]
pinyin: Chun1 feng1 Shen1 zui4 de5 Wan3 shang5

sentences.english: I finished watching the movie The Proposal this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了电影《假结婚》。

sentences.english: Ono released a statement Tuesday night in tribute to Lennon.
sentences.chinese: 小野周二晚上发表的一份声明中赞扬侬。

sentences.english: That thunderstorm the other night frightened little Tom half to death.
sentences.chinese: 前两天晚上的那场雷雨把小汤姆吓得半死。

sentences.english: In the evening I enjoyed the hot pot with my friends.
sentences.chinese: 晚上又和朋友打了一会儿火锅。

sentences.english: And she had a dictation with me this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她和我一块听写了那些内容。

sentences.english: Small niches line the walkway and are illuminated by diyas (small lamps) in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 小壁龛沿走道排布，晚上被小油灯照亮。

sentences.english: That night the smallest rabbit hid in the grass by the pool.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，最小的兔子藏在小池边的矮树丛里。

sentences.english: This evening I smell bad , don't eat anying.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上味口不好，没有吃任何东西。

sentences.english: And then, Hu Yin comes here every evening.
sentences.chinese: 于是，胡公子每天晚上都来。

sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上将炉渣从炉子里耙出来。

sentences.english: AT seven-thirty Friday evening Scali passed this word along.
sentences.chinese: 星期五晚上七时半，斯卡利把话传了过去。

sentences.english: Lana said that she wouldn't go to Marcia's house on Friday night.
sentences.chinese: 兰娜说星期五晚上她不会去马西娅家。

sentences.english: That same night, Javert wrote a letter.
sentences.chinese: 沙威在当天晚上写了一封信。

sentences.english: So the good spirit collected wood every night.
sentences.chinese: 于是这位善良的神仙每天晚上收集木柴。

sentences.english: The main transportation sand stone material, evening does, best leaves Pan Lijin.
sentences.chinese: 主要运输沙石料，晚上干，最好离潘里近的。

sentences.english: That evening when she entered the theatre the manager had a most pleasant greeting for her.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，当她走进戏院时，经理极其和悦地招呼她。

definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
